Class PlayerUtils

  • public class PlayerUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods to interact with players

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void allowIP(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Un-blacklists an IP address, as well as all corresponding players
      static void allowPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Un-blacklists just a player, not the IP
      static void blacklistIP(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Searches up player(s) from ip, and blacklists all of them.
      static void blacklistPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Blacklist just a player from participating in mitigation events, not the IP

      Check if the held itemstack contains specified lore

      Check if the held itemstack contains a specific string, case-insensitive

      Returns nearby entities within range of another entity/player
      static org.bukkit.block.Block[] getTargetBlock(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, int range)
      Returns an array, array[0] is the last block before the player's raytrace crosses a block, and array[1] is the block the raytrace collides with
      static java.lang.String lookUpRealAddress(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Return IP address of player for mitigations
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> loreInHand(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Parse and return the lore in player's held item
      static boolean shouldUse(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
      Utility method to determine whether custom items should function at the player's location
